message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value to both parties involved. Given its significance and the unique benefits it offers, we believe it's worth more than what others might perceive. Considering its true worth to you, we propose a fair transaction price of $1,200,000. This amount reflects not only the product's market value but also acknowledges its unparalleled utility to someone like yourself. We hope this offer aligns with your expectations and looks forward to discussing further details with you.
